questions.name: occupation
questions.title: Which of the following best describes your primary occupation?
choices: (b) Art, writing, or journalism (e.g., author, reporter, sculptor)
(c) Business, management, or financial (e.g., manager, accountant, banker)
(d) Computer engineer or IT professional (e.g., systems administrator, programmer, IT consultant)
(f) Engineer in other fields (e.g., civil engineer, bio-engineer)
